info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 6:41PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Butte and northwestern Lawrence Counties through 730 PM MDT... At 641 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Spearfish, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Spearfish, Belle Fourche, Saint Onge, Fruitdale, Crow Peak, Arpan, Belle Fourche Reservoir and northern Spearfish Canyon. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 6 and 18. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
